Description:
Detects usage of Gpg4win to encrypt/decrypt files located in potentially suspicious locations.

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), X__Junior (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: File Encryption/Decryption Via Gpg4win From Suspicious Locations
Query: sourcetype="windows-sysmon" (command="*:\\PerfLogs\\*" OR command="*:\\Temp\\*" OR command="*:\\Users\\Public\\*" OR command="*:\\Windows\\Temp\\*" OR command="*\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\*" OR command="*\\AppData\\Roaming\\*") ((process_path="*\\gpg.exe" OR process_path="*\\gpg2.exe") product="GNU Privacy Guard (GnuPG)" description="GnuPGâ€™s OpenPGP tool") command="*-passphrase*"
